content: Equities Securities Stocks Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 20 Mar 2019How to keep track of your stock portfolio? How do you track your investment portfolio; the processing fee of buying and selling, the dividends you get along the way, the average price of the shares? Is there an application that can help you keep track or is excel spreadsheet the only solution now?3 answersAnswerBump0
